meanings.sent1: She crossed the street unwarily, not looking both ways.
meanings.sent2: He unwarily left his phone on the table, forgetting to take it with him.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel unwarily ran into the road, narrowly avoiding a passing car.
meanings.sent4: The child unwarily wandered off from the group, getting lost in the park.
meanings.sent5: The hiker unwarily stepped on a loose rock, causing him to slip and fall.

meanings.definition: In a careless or heedless manner
meanings.sent1: She unwarily left her umbrella at the restaurant, not realizing until it started raining.
meanings.sent2: He unwarily clicked on a suspicious link, infecting his computer with a virus.
meanings.sent3: The student unwarily forgot about the test, only remembering when it was too late.
meanings.sent4: The driver unwarily ignored the stop sign, leading to a near collision.
meanings.sent5: The chef unwarily added too much salt to the dish, making it inedible.
